LanguageData.S.DelayRangeTooltip: Base raid arrival time after it has been discovered
LanguageData.S.EdgeWalkInGroups: Walking in form the edge(in groups)
LanguageData.S.EdgeDropGroups: Drop podding at the edge(in groups)
LanguageData.S.multiplier: Below 1 will reduce the delay for specific arrival method, above will increase it
LanguageData.S.AccurateTooltip: Disabled - when movement is spotted an interval of time for their arrival will be displayed Enabled - when movement is spotted the exact arrival time is displayed
